alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 12:43PM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Wind chill as cold as 5 below zero. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. The cold wind chills as low as 5 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
